apis.name: Assisted Service Webservices
apis.description: These services provide the ability for agents to assist customers with their order, and look up the order by name, email, cart, or order number.

apis.name: Order Management Webservices
apis.description: These services manage order cancellations, returns, fraud, and payment transactions.

apis.name: Coupon Webservices
apis.description: These services generate or administer coupons.

apis.name: Warehousing Webservices
apis.description: These services manage consignments, stock levels, and points of service.

apis.name: Inbound B2B Customer
apis.description: Integration API for replication of B2B Customers belonging to a B2B Unit to SAP Commerce Cloud

apis.name: Inbound B2B Unit
apis.description: Integration API to replicate B2B Units to SAP Commerce Cloud for B2B scenarios

apis.name: Inbound Discount Row
apis.description: Integration API to replicate Discount Conditions as Discount Rows to SAP Commerce Cloud

apis.name: Inbound ERP Product Variant
apis.description: Integration API to replicate ERP Product Variant to SAP Commerce Cloud

apis.name: Inbound OMM Order
apis.description: API to replicate OMM Order to SAP Commerce Cloud

apis.name: Inbound OMM OrderEntry
apis.description: Integration API for replication of Order Entries for cart and checkout scenarios

apis.name: Inbound OMM StockLevel
apis.description: Integration API for replication of Stock Levels for Cart and Checkout Scenarios

apis.name: Inbound OMS Order
apis.description: API to replicate Orders to SAP Commerce Cloud as part of the OMS scenario when integrating with SAP backends

apis.name: Inbound OMS StockLevel
apis.description: Integration API for replication of Stock Levels for OMS Scenarios

apis.name: Inbound Price Row
apis.description: Integration API to replicate Price Conditions as Price Rows to SAP Commerce Cloud

apis.name: Inbound Product
apis.description: Integration API to replicate Base and Sales Area Products to SAP Commerce Cloud
